structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ACQUISITION OF WATERWORKS BY CITIES AND WATER DISTRICTS

law.text: If the water district commissioners or city legislative body finds that the bonds authorized will be insufficient to accomplish the purpose desired, additional bonds may be authorized and issued in the same manner.
law.history: Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 16, effective June 17, 1954.
